DYAD: ISRAEL-SWITZERLAND

PSNOTES:

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4515 

TERRMID: MID4515 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4515 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4515 from cm narrative, Israeli soldiers fired on a Swiss diplomat's car as it pulled into a checkpoint in Gaza. It is unclear why the soldier opened fire. Coded not territory because no boundary dispute was present. 

TERRLINK: MID4515 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4515 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES:

MARITMID-CER: MID4515 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES:

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4515
rivalry=225666 nationa=ISRAEL nationb=SWITZERLAND MID4515 20030526-20030526 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Israeli soldiers opened fire on a Swiss diplomats car as it crossed a checkpoint in the Gaza Strip. It is unclear why the soldiers opened fire on the car. First day of dispute was on 5/26/2003 and last day of dispute was on 5/26/2003.
